pages.text: $(li)The Depth Strider enchantment can be applied in any kind of Boots.$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases your movement speed while you are underwater.
pages.title: Depth Strider

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Depth Strider).
